description: Revision to planning permission ref. 03/04554 (for elevational alterations and part 7th/ 8th floor extensions, screened roof terrace and conversion from offices to 25 one bedroom and 24 two bedroom flats with 53 parking spaces, hard and soft landscaping, cycle parking and refuse storage) to provide 9 additional residential units and a total of 58 units comprising 43 one bedroom and 15 two bedroom flats, 5 additional parking spaces, alterations to the 7th/ 8th floor extension and enclosure of the existing external escape stairs at rear of building
